title: Ticket #1174: Ship proper OpenMPI example scripts with Condor
description: Users have been asking for OpenMPI (mpirun) wrapper scripts that works w/ Condor. Pete has consed up some scripts and usage examples to be included in releases.
remarks:
2010-Feb-03 12:56:05 by pmackinn:
In sshd.sh this line:

lines=`grep "$thisrun" $_CONDOR_SCRATCH_DIR/contact | wc -l`

could/should be:

lines=`grep -c "$thisrun" $_CONDOR_SCRATCH_DIR/contact`
attachments:
• bz537232.tar 20480 bytes added by matt on 2010-Feb-03 13:40:04 UTC.
    OpenMPI Example (tar)
